products.title: Isla PVC Blackout Sorbet Pink Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Isla PVC Blackout Sorbet Pink Electric Roller Blind in Pink. Made to measure from £151.50 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Bring a splash of soft colour into your room of choice with Isla PVC Blackout Sorbet Pink, an adorably pastel pink electric roller blind with a subtle double-sided leafy design that instantly draws the eye without overpowering. Perfect in a pale or neutral room, its delicate style will stand the test of time. With a blackout fabric present in the blind, it keeps daylight out when you want it to and the flame-retardant finish is a useful safety feature. Pair your electric roller blinds with the Smart Hub and operate your blinds with your Amazon Alexa or with Google Home. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX1980 Fabric Colour: Sorbet Pink Material: 3 Ply Vinyl, 1 Ply Fibreglass Lining: Pattern Match Backing - See sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes
